alert.note: Alert for Newcastle (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 7:02PM MST until January 04 at 12:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Southern Foot Hills, the Western Fall River County Plains and the Eastern Fall River County Plains. In Wyoming, the Newcastle Area. * WHEN...Until noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists may encounter areas of frosty and slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
